title: VR-Based Programming Algorithm Learning Design

context.additional_context: Enhancing comprehension for novice learners through algorithm visualization and interactive learning in a VR environment.

learning_goals: Learners possess the ability to implement and explain sorting/search algorithms in a VR simulation environment with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can logically reproduce the step-by-step execution process of algorithms through VR interface manipulation.
Learners solve algorithm optimization problems in a VR-based collaborative environment and participate in peer evaluations and feedback sessions at least three times.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
